name: Slime Hunter (BirdBrain Studios)
description:
DISCLAIMER: *Warning Mild Flashing Colours* This is a game made in 5 days for Billy's Basement Game Jam, the theme is glitched - this is not a polished game. 

Face off against King Slime in this fun action-packed game where you fight the final boss straight after the tutorial level due to an unknown glitch that has been lurking around the game. All bugs are definitely intentional.

Controls:

Esc - Quit or go back to Menu

V - Toggle sound in the Menu

F - Toggle full-screen

P - Pickup potions

WASD/ Arrow Keys to move

Bump into Enemies to Attack
